title: Roasted Veggie Tacos
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
Optional toppings: avocado, salsa, lime, cilantro, feta
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Toss bell peppers, onion, and zucchini with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Spread vegetables on a sheet pan and roast 18-20 minutes until browned at the edges.
Warm black beans in a small pot; season with salt and a squeeze of lime if desired.
Warm tortillas. Fill with roasted veggies and beans. Top with avocado, salsa, cilantro, feta, and lime.
notes: Great with chipotle crema or pickled red onions.
